definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Bissau is the capital and the largest city.
sentences.chinese: 比绍为该国首都及最大城市。

sentences.english: Guinea-Bissau first head of state dies.
sentences.chinese: 几内亚比绍首任国家元首去世。

sentences.english: Cholera epidemics regularly resurge in Guinea-Bissau.
sentences.chinese: 几内亚比绍经常流行霍乱疫情。

sentences.english: In many areas of Guinea-Bissau, basic infrastructures appear to be largely inefficient.
sentences.chinese: 在几内亚比绍许多地区，基础设施大多失灵。

sentences.english: Guinea Bissau has a history of coups and coup attempts.
sentences.chinese: 几内亚比绍历来有政变和企图政变的传统。

sentences.english: "In Guinea-Bissau we have had a lot of killings, " Monteiro noted.
sentences.chinese: 在几内亚比绍，有很多人被杀害。

sentences.english: He said that friendship with China has become part of Guinea Bissau's national interests.
sentences.chinese: 与中国的友谊已经成为几内亚比绍国家利益的一部分。

sentences.english: Local drug dealers settle a score in Bissau, Guinea-Bissau.
sentences.chinese: 在几内亚比绍共和国首都比绍，当地毒贩被绞。

sentences.english: Local drug dealers settle a score in Bissau, Guinea-Bissau.
sentences.chinese: 在几内亚比绍共和国首都比绍，当地毒贩被绞。

definition: abbr. for Papua New Guinea 巴布亞新幾內亞|巴布亚新几内亚[Ba1 bu4 ya4 Xin1 Ji3 nei4 ya4]
Dar es Salaam (former capital of Tanzania)
pinyin: Da2 lei4 si1 Sa4 la1 mu3

definition: Bia, daughter of Pallas and Styx in Greek mythology, personification of violence
